question: Where is located the headquarters of the North East Zone Cultural Centre ?
explanation: There are Seven Zonal Cultural Centers functioning as autonomous bodies under the Ministry of Culture. They were set up in 1985 to 1986. A provision of Rs. 2159.00 Lakhs was made for them in 2009-10. The 7 centers and their headquarters are as follows: North Central Zone Cultural Centre - Allahabad, North Zone Cultural Centre - Patiala, West Zone Cultural Centre - Udaipur, North East Zone Cultural Centre - Dimapur, Eastern Zone Cultural Centre - Kolkata ,South Zone Cultural Centre - Thanjavur, South Central Zone Cultural Centre -Nagpur
